content: Athenahealth Inc   which is under pressure from activist investor Elliott Management  said it would reduce about 9 percent of its workforce as part of efforts to generate $100 million to $115 million in savings by the end of 2018.
name: athenahealth Inc
title: Healthcare software provider Athenahealth to cut 9 percent of workforce

content: Oct 19 Athenahealth Inc  which is under pressure from activist investor Elliott Management  said it would reduce about 9 percent of its workforce as part of efforts to generate $100 million to $115 million in savings by the end of 2018.

title: Healthcare software provider Athenahealth to cut 9 pct of workforce

content: May 18 Athenahealth Inc shares jumped nearly 20 percent on Thursday  after hedge fund Elliott Management disclosed a large stake in the healthcare software provider  saying it planned to push operational and strategic changes at the company.
name: athenahealth Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Athenahealth shares soar after Elliott discloses 9.2 pct stake

content: May 18 Activist investor Elliott Management disclosed a 9.2 percent stake in Athenahealth Inc on Thursday  calling the healthcare software provider's shares "significantly undervalued."
name: athenahealth Inc
title: Elliott reveals stake in Athenahealth  seeks to engage with board
